entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Flurries beginning in the evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
